text:
The last time Eden Hazard scored a goal:

- Adekunle Gold wasn't a father
- Ashley young was bald
- Mompha and Hushpuppi were successful 'businessmen'
- Messi had 5 Balon d'ors
- NYSC allowee was 19,800
- Pop smoke, Kobe and Juice Wrld were still alive 💔
- Covid-19 didn't exist
